name: Mirror puzzle 01
description:
You find a room filled with mirrors and boxes, a crystal eye is built into the wall and surrounding it, the following sentence is carved:

"Bring me a ray of sunlight, and it shall illuminate the path forward."

Instructions:

  • Click on light boxes, mirrors or the light source to select them.
  • Move boxes and mirrors with ZQSD or arrow keys.
  • Rotate the light source and mirrors with Space.

Good luck, adventurer!
